title: SF Municipal Green Building Inventory
description: LEED certification is required for all municipal construction projects that are at least 10,000 square feet. This is a list of LEED certified projects owned and operated by the City and County of San Francisco. Data includes: Project name, Gross Area, Rating system and version; Level and date of certification; Project address.

columns.name: Project Name
columns.description: The common name of the project.

columns.name: Gross Area
columns.description: Gross area of the project in square feet.

columns.name: Rating System
columns.description: LEED Rating System type (e.g., BD+C, ID+C, O+M, etc.)

columns.name: Version
columns.description: LEED Rating System version (e.g., v1.0, v2.0, 2009, v4, etc.)

columns.name: Level
columns.description: LEED Certification level (e.g., Certified, Silver, Gold, Platinum)

columns.name: Address
columns.description: The address of the LEED certified project

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods_from_6ia5_2f8k' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Police Districts 2' (qgnn-b9vv) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts 2' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods - Analysis Boundaries' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'geocoded_column' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
